entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
